body:
We refactored all of that for 2.0. Please see this document for updated
documentation:

http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/ipython/ipython/blob/master/examples/notebooks/User%20Interface.ipynb

On Sun, Jan 26, 2014 at 11:51 AM, John Griffiths
notifications@github.comwrote:

> I recently pulled latest ipython version and re-installed, and now the
> all-important keyboard shortcuts aren't working. Not as they should at
> least.
> 
> Was assuming this was my fault perhaps because of playing around with the
> .css stuff in the profile dir. But have just installed the dev repo on a
> fresh anaconda install on entirely different system and am getting the same
> prob.
> 
> Googled but no info on this prob I can find.
> 
> How can I fix this?
> 
> (this happens in firefox and chrome)
> 
> Ta.
> 
> john
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/4879
> .

## 

Brian E. Granger
Cal Poly State University, San Luis Obispo
bgranger@calpoly.edu and ellisonbg@gmail.com

Excellent. I thought this might be the case. Thanks very much.
